about_the_game:
Welcome, archaeologist! Embark on a journey of discovery into the mysterious world of ancient Egypt with "Lost in Hieroglyphs: A Hidden Objects Expedition." In this unique hidden object game, dive into an unforgettable adventure filled with ancient hieroglyphs.

You will be able to learn another part of the story with each chapter you complete.

Explore a world filled with ancient hieroglyphs, from ancient temples to mysterious pyramids, lost in the heart of ancient Egypt. Uncover forgotten secrets and, as an archaeologist tasked with finding legendary treasures, dive deep into the depths of these ancient lands.

This game offers an unforgettable experience for players who want to explore the rich culture and history of ancient Egypt. Uncover the mysterious secrets of the ancient world and embark on an unforgettable archaeological adventure with "Lost in Hieroglyphs: A Hidden Objects Expedition!"

Hidden Object Discovery: Find hidden objects in ancient locations and reveal lost treasures. There are a total of 180 hidden objects in 6 chapters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Hidden Object Discovery: Find hidden objects in ancient locations and reveal lost treasures. There are a total of 180 hidden objects in 6 chapters.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
